branchCategory.name: AFJ, Vacuum Filter
branchCategory.description: <P>Series AFJ filters prevent trouble in vacuum equipment caused by contaminants in the air. There are two filter styles available for applications that require large flow or water removal. The elements can be reused after washing for ease of maintenance.</P>
